content: this legal text is about a property dispute case that has gone through multiple court instances the final resolution was that the applicants proposal to divide the property was dismissed as inadmissible in the first instance the court dismissed the petitioners motion because the property was registered under the ownership of a third party and the petitioner lacked legal interest the petitioner appealed this decision claiming that the court violated procedural rules they argue that they have the right to terminate the banks ownership rights over the property the text also references the property act to support the arguments made and explains the concepts of ownership coownership and the right to terminate coownership
